reviewText:
I bought this thinking the story sounded good, and the price was low enough for me to take a chance... I'm sorry I did.  While the audio was decent (some cliche lines) the animation made me think of a poorly done flip book.  You had characters passing through each other, movements were jerky.  The drawings looked like something out of the Sunday funnies.

All in all, I should have saved the cash and bought something else.
